oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ON POLYNOMIAL ISOTOPY OF KNOT-TYPES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SHUKLA, R
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: noncompact knots
polynomial isotopy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have proved that every knot-type R hooked arror pointing right R3 can be uniquely represented by polynomials up to polynomial isotopy i.e. if two polynomial embeddings of R in R3 represent the same knot-type, then we can join them by polynomial embeddings.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: PROCEEDINGS OF THE INDIAN ACADEMY OF SCIENCES-MATHEMATICAL SCIENCES, 104(3), 543-548
